query.select: SELECT v.requisition_number attr_1, v.csh_type_id_display attr_2, v.requisition_date attr_3, v.amount attr_4, v.employee_id_display attr_5, v.position_id_display attr_6, v.payment_requisition_attach_id attr_7, v.currency_code_display attr_8, v.payment_requisition_create_by attr_9, v.description attr_10 FROM (SELECT (SELECT employee_code || '-' || NAME FROM exp_employees ee WHERE ee.employee_id = cprh.employee_id) employee_id_display, (SELECT NAME FROM exp_employees ee WHERE ee.employee_id = (SELECT employee_id FROM sys_user su WHERE su.user_id = cprh.created_by)) payment_requisition_create_by, to_char(cprh.requisition_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') requisition_date, gld.currency_name AS currency_code_display, cprh.requisition_number, cprh.amount, cprh.description, cprh.payment_requisition_header_id, (SELECT description FROM exp_org_position_vl eopv WHERE eopv.position_id = cprh.position_id) position_id_display, (SELECT (t.description || '-' || t.position_code) parent_pos_desc FROM exp_org_position_vl t WHERE t.enabled_flag = 'Y' AND t.position_id = cprh.position_id AND t.company_id = cprh.company_id) pos_desc, (SELECT (t.description || '-' || t.position_code) parent_pos_desc FROM exp_org_position_vl t, exp_employee_assigns_v emp WHERE t.enabled_flag = 'Y' AND t.position_id = emp.position_id AND t.company_id = cprh.company_id AND emp.employee_id = cprh.employee_id AND emp.primary_position_flag = 'Y' AND emp.assign_enabled_flag = 'Y' AND emp.employee_enabled_flag = 'Y') parent_pos_desc, cprh.status p_status, cprh.payment_req_type_id, (SELECT description FROM csh_pay_req_types_vl cprt WHERE cprt.type_id = cprh.payment_req_type_id) AS csh_type_id_display, cprh.source_type, cprh.attachment_num payment_requisition_attach_id FROM csh_payment_requisition_hds cprh, gld_currency_vl gld WHERE cprh.requisition_number = ${@param_1} AND ( ${@param_2} is null or EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM wfl_instance_node_recipient wi, wfl_workflow_instance wwi WHERE wi.instance_id = wwi.instance_id AND wwi.document_number = cprh.requisition_number AND wi.record_id = nvl(${@param_2}, wi.record_id) )) AND gld.currency_code(+) = cprh.currency_code) v

SELECT v.description attr_1, v.cls_des attr_2, v.partner_category_name attr_3, v.p_partner_name attr_4, v.amount attr_5, v.account_number_ext attr_6, v.account_name attr_7, v.payment_method_id_display attr_8, v.plan_repayment_date attr_9, v.repay_desc attr_10, (SELECT cch.contract_number FROM con_contract_headers cch WHERE cch.contract_header_id = v.contract_header_id) attr_11 , (SELECT conl.payment_schedule_line_number FROM con_payment_schedules conl WHERE conl.payment_schedule_line_id = v.contract_l_id) attr_12 FROM (SELECT cprl.payment_requisition_header_id, cprl.payment_requisition_line_id, (SELECT e.description FROM csh_payment_methods_vl e WHERE e.payment_method_id = cprl.payment_method) payment_method_id_display, cprl.amount, cprl.description, cprl.account_number, decode(cprl.partner_category, 'EMPLOYEE', decode(cprl.account_number, NULL, NULL, '*******' || substr(cprl.account_number, -4, 4)), cprl.account_number) account_number_ext, cprl.account_name, (SELECT cdf.document_id FROM con_document_flows cdf WHERE cdf.document_type = 'CON_CONTRACT' AND cdf.source_document_type = 'CSH_PAYMENT_REQUISITION_LNS' AND cdf.source_document_id = cprl.payment_requisition_header_id AND cdf.source_document_line_id = cprl.payment_requisition_line_id) contract_header_id, (SELECT cdf.document_line_id FROM con_document_flows cdf WHERE cdf.document_type = 'CON_CONTRACT' AND cdf.source_document_type = 'CSH_PAYMENT_REQUISITION_LNS' AND cdf.source_document_id = cprl.payment_requisition_header_id AND cdf.source_document_line_id = cprl.payment_requisition_line_id) contract_l_id, (SELECT NAME FROM (SELECT cev.employee_id id, cev.company_id, cev.name || '-' || cev.employee_code NAME, cev.employee_code, 'EMPLOYEE' partner_category FROM exp_company_employees_v cev WHERE cev.employee_enabled_flag = 'Y' UNION SELECT svv.vender_id, cv.company_id, svv.description || '-' || svv.vender_code, svv.vender_code, 'VENDER' partner_category FROM pur_company_venders cv, pur_system_venders_vl svv WHERE cv.vender_id = svv.vender_id AND cv.enabled_flag = 'Y' UNION SELECT cv.customer_id, cc.company_id, cv.description || '-' || cv.customer_code, cv.customer_code, 'CUSTOMER' partner_category FROM ord_company_customers cc, ord_system_customers_vl cv WHERE cc.customer_id = cv.customer_id AND cc.enabled_flag = 'Y') cat WHERE partner_category = cprl.partner_category AND id = cprl.partner_id AND cprl.company_id = company_id) p_partner_name, (SELECT v.code_value_name FROM sys_codes s, sys_code_values_vl v WHERE s.code = 'PAYMENT_OBJECT' AND s.code_id = v.code_id AND v.code_value = cprl.partner_category) AS partner_category_name, (SELECT a.description FROM csh_transaction_classes_vl a WHERE a.csh_transaction_type_code = 'PREPAYMENT' AND a.enabled_flag = 'Y' AND a.csh_transaction_class_code = cprl.csh_transaction_class_code) cls_des, decode(cprl.repay_code, 'Y', '收据已上缴', 'N', '收据未上缴', NULL) repay_desc, (SELECT sc.code_value_name FROM sys_codes s, sys_code_values_vl sc WHERE s.code_id = sc.code_id AND sc.code_value = cprl.repay_status AND s.code = 'RECEIPT_STATUS') repay_status_desc, to_char(cprl.plan_repayment_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') plan_repayment_date FROM csh_payment_requisition_lns cprl,csh_payment_requisition_hds h WHERE cprl.payment_requisition_header_id = h.payment_requisition_header_id and h.requisition_number = ${@param_1} AND ( ${@param_2} is null or EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM wfl_instance_node_recipient wi, wfl_workflow_instance wwi WHERE wi.instance_id = wwi.instance_id AND wwi.document_number = h.requisition_number AND wi.record_id = nvl(${@param_2}, wi.record_id) )) ) v ORDER BY payment_requisition_line_id
SELECT t1.csh_oasign_text attr_1 FROM CSH_REQ_OASIGN t1, csh_payment_requisition_hds h WHERE t1.PAYMENT_REQUISITION_HEADER_ID = h.PAYMENT_REQUISITION_HEADER_ID AND h.requisition_number = ${@param_1}
